tasks.name: Formatar arquivos C# staged com CSharpier (PowerShell)
args: git diff --cached --name-only --diff-filter=ACM | Where-Object { $_ -like '*.cs' } | ForEach-Object { dotnet csharpier format $_ }; git diff --cached --name-only --diff-filter=ACM | Where-Object { $_ -like '*.cs' } | ForEach-Object { git add $_ }
